name: Milo The Menace Of Candyland
description:
A fast-paced puzzle game! Use the power of portals and gumballs to help Milo guide the gingerbread people to their doom and to his salivating mouth! Compete with other players - the more gingerbread destined for Milo's dinner, the higher your score on the leaderboard!

Uses SilentWolf for the online leaderboard: https://silentwolf.com/

Made for Godot Wild Jam 33. Theme: You aren't the hero.

Default controls: WASD to move. Spacebar to place a portal. 1/2 to switch portals. Change controls via Settings.

Designed to be played in full screen.

NOTE: PLEASE PLAY THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION FOR THE BEST POSSIBLE EXPERIENCE! AUDIO OFTEN LAGS WITH THE HTML5 VERSION.
